price: そうすれば、われら*は彼らに、われら*の御許からの偉大な褒美を授けたのだが。
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
